text:
Donna Lee Custer ("née" Hickey; born January 8, 1928), better known as May Wynn, is a retired American dancer, singer and actress. Her acting career lasted from around 1952 to 1960. She notably appeared in "The Caine Mutiny" (1954), "The Violent Men" (1955), "The Man Is Armed" (1956) and "Perry Mason" (1959).
Wynn was born in New York City. In 1956, Wynn married actor Jack Kelly in Quartzsite, Arizona. The couple divorced in 1964. She was married to her second husband Jack W. Custer from 1968 to 1979.
